title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Helix, California
content:
Photo submitted by Alex Tapia, “It is a hefty climb to the top, but it is worth every pedal stroke…beautiful views, clean air…and the workout of-course. 2021 Cannondale Topstone Carbon Lefty 3.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Helix, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
